nodes.text: Xiizor was a clone of Xizor, the leader of the Black Sun crime syndicate. When Grand Admiral Thrawn's agent, Luuke Skywalker, was unable to get samples to clone the ancient Dark Lord of the Sith Exar Kun or Callista Ming, a woman whose original body had been destroyed, the Chiss Admiral was rankled. However, he was sated when Skywalker gave him a sample from Prince Xizor. Thrawn still liked to play holochess with Xiizor in 44 ABY, though the Falleen moped because he could not run Black Sun.
Xiizor was mentioned in "An Apology", a short story by Timothy Zahn that was released on April 1, 2012 as an April Fool's Day joke.
